name: Avoid using Javascript String typecheck in AngularJS application
description: You should use the angular.isString method instead of the default JavaScript implementation (typeof "" === "[object String]"). This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCRM-CWE-252-data, ASCRM-CWE-704, ASCMM-MNT-20 recommendations.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Ensure you are using the AngularJS API, you should use the AngularJS isString method.

qualityStandards.name: ASCMM-MNT-20: Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element
ASCRM-CWE-252-data: Unchecked Return Parameter Value of named Callable and Method Control Element with Read, Write, and Manage Access to Data Resource
ASCRM-CWE-704: Incorrect Type Conversion or Cast
